title: The Royal visit: surf carnival 1974
brief_description: A record of the visit of His Royal Highness, Prince Charles, to a surf life saving carnival at Coolangatta on the Gold Coast. Includes the procession and march past of the competing teams and highlights of the life saving, surf board riding and surf rescue boat competitions. Without commentary.
